FuncDef: This command provides a mechanism to configure the CIR for the congestion override policer. It is recommended that the CIR is configured larger than twice the maximum MTU for the traffic handled by the policer to allow for some burstiness of the traffic. The CIR is configurable for dual-bucket bandwidth policers only.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer value defining size, in kilobytes, for the CIR of thepolicer. Values-0 to 100000000.
